General.Name: Touchwood Entertainment Limited
General.Description: Touchwood Entertainment Limited engages in the event management business in India. It offers wedding management, design and décor, destination and venues, entertainment, invitations and gifting, hospitality and guest management, logistic, food and beverage, and budget management services. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: 26, Thapar Farms Church Road, New Delhi, India, 110070
